name: SH-PUP!
description:
Based on the theme "Get a Load of That Dog"

WASD - MOVE / SPACE - SHOOT

In this game you just really gotta get a load of that dog!!

- v2 -

  • Fixed sound!
  • Effects!
  • Parachute dogs!
  • Enemy counter!

- v3 -

  • Bosses!
  • Fight Tooth and Nail, the greaser dog twins!
  • Battle against Alpha and his swarm of backup!
  • Play in browser!
  • Woof!
